properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 6:33PM EST until February 2 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 20 kt.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Drum Point including
Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth
Island, and the lower tidal Potomac from Cobb Island to Smith
Point.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING
